release_slug.description: Unique textual identifier (slug) of the module Release resource to retrieve

with_html.description: Render markdown files (README, REFERENCE, etc.) to HTML before returning results

include_fields.description: List of top level keys to include in response object, only applies to fields marked 'optional'

exclude_fields.description: List of top level keys to exclude from response object

If-Modified-Since.description:
Only processes the request if the resource or list of resources has changed since the given time,
otherwise returns a `304 Not Modified` response
